programme.title: President Bush and Winston Churchill
programme.short_synopsis: President George H W Bush's handling of foreign affairs helps his re-election.
programme.medium_synopsis: President George H W Bush's ratings for re-election are boosted by the Gorbachev coup. Cooke compares his invulnerability with that of Winston Churchill.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
